turns.speaker: user

turns.speaker: user

turns.utterance: Bella Italia does have gluten-free pizza, and it's quite popular based on reviews. Regarding how I decide which places to list, I analyze various factors. We also have partnerships with various restaurant platforms. Does that answer your question?
